name: Bugg - Commodore PET Game by Kevin Pickell
name_original: Bugg - Commodore PET Game by Kevin Pickell
description:
This game used to work only on the Commodore 3000 series PET.

I modified to to work on the Commodore 4000 series (4.0 ROM) by relocating the routines away from the $0300 bank of memory.

This game also supports the Stupid Pet Tricks joystick controller!

Thank you to KP for granting permission for this to be published.
